import axios from'axios';var getBasicData=function getBasicData(history,setUserName,setAuthentication,setCatJson){var frame=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:"none";axios.post('/api/users/status',{junk:""}).then(function(res){if(res.data.status==="1"){if(frame!=="chat")history.push('/chat/');else if(setAuthentication){var username=res.data.username;setAuthentication(res.data.authentication);setUserName(username);setCatJson(res.data.categories);}}else if(history.location.pathname!=="/signup"){history.push('/');}}).catch(function(err){console.error("f error",err);// history.push('/');
});};export{getBasicData};
